plays.text: Goal scored by Martin Straka assisted by Tomas Surovy and Eric Meloche
Goal scored by Darren McCarty assisted by Nicklas Lidstrom and Kirk Maltby
2 minute Bench Penalty for Too Many Men on the Ice served by Pavel Datsyuk
Goal scored by Brendan Shanahan assisted by Sergei Fedorov and Mathieu Dandenault
Penalty to Dmitri Bykov 2 minutes for Tripping Guillaume Lefebvre
Penalty to Brendan Shanahan 2 minutes for Obstruction - Hooking MATTIAS JOHANSSON
Goal scored by Sergei Fedorov assisted by Steve Yzerman and Brendan Shanahan
Penalty to Martin Straka 2 minutes for Obstruction - Holding the Stick Pavel Datsyuk
Goal scored by Sergei Fedorov assisted by Tomas Holmstrom and Brendan Shanahan
Penalty to Steve Yzerman 2 minutes for Hooking Brian Holzinger
Goal scored by Luc Robitaille assisted by Igor Larionov and Tomas Holmstrom
